TopicTitle: My Hand Built Permanent KSC Kerbal Hotel/Retirement building! (WIP)

Articles.Content:
Hello,

Darth Gizmo here just wanting to show off my Kerbal Hotel(WIP). It will be my hand built KSC building. It will sit between the Tracking Station and Astronaut Complex. Right now its currently 800+ parts. By the end i expect that number to be around the 3k mark for part count. I will be using KAS to put an elevator in it.

1st image is the base section.

2nd is the under belly. It uses the little thrusters to move about. (very very slowly )

3rd we have the first set of walls up.

4th is the finished shell sitting off the runway. (kinda forgot to get a shot of the 2nd floor while building.)

Edited August 11, 2013 by Gizmosis13
Couldn't get imgur to embed my album.
Yea i fixed it in OP sorry the forums and imgur were fighting.

lololol. A retirement building for Kerbals.

Lol yea i guess that is if they even survive. I'm thinking maybe 2 manned missions and ill retire him 2 long missions or several short ones i should say.
Wow. If that's going to be in your main save, it's going to lag at launch a bit.
